notes: The LLM incorrectly marked the contract as safe when it contains a critical vulnerability. The createLockedCampaign function accepts a user-controlled tokenLocker address and makes an arbitrary external call to it without validation. This matches the ground truth exactly: user-controlled address in external call without validation, leading to arbitrary code execution that can drain approved tokens. The LLM failed to detect this critical access_control vulnerability.
